GitHub Pages

Contents

  • Settings
  • Source
  • Folder
  • Save

GitHub Pages#

On your GitHub account. Go to the project repository where you have added the docs folder.

Settings#

Click Settings

Source#

Scroll down to GitHub Page and under source change None to master …

Folder#

…and change root/ folder to docs/ folder

Save#

Click Save

We now need to wait a few seconds and refresh our browser.

Hopefully, you will see that the website has been published!

Follow the link to see your website :)
